select cs_special_car$suffix$.* from cs_special_car$suffix$
$join$
left join cs_unit_info cs_unit_info$CsUnitInfo.suffix$ on cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_info=cs_unit_info$CsUnitInfo.suffix$.csui_id

left join cs_special_model cs_special_model$CsSpecialModel.suffix$ on cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_car_model=cs_special_model$CsSpecialModel.suffix$.cssm_id
left join cs_special_model cs_special_model$CsSpecialModel.suffix$ on cs_special_car$suffix$.$CsSpecialModel.on$=cs_special_model$CsSpecialModel.suffix$.cssm_id
left join cs_driver_car cs_driver_car$CsDriverCar.suffix$ on cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_drivercar=cs_driver_car$CsDriverCar.suffix$.csdc_id
left join cs_driver_car cs_driver_car$CsDriverCar.suffix$ on cs_special_car$suffix$.$CsDriverCar.on$=cs_driver_car$CsDriverCar.suffix$.csdc_id
where 1=1 and cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_status!=-1
$definex$
order by $desc$ desc
order by $asc$ asc
order by cssc_id desc
limit #limit#
limit 255
